Path¶

class path.Path(type: int, s: float, v: float, datum: float, rel_angle: float, follow: bool, compass: bool, bump_mode: int)¶

Implement Custom Data Structure for running defined paths

Initializes Path Object

Parameters:

  • type – Path Type (LINE or TURN)

  • s – Path Length [mm]

  • v – Path Longitudinal Velocity [mm/s]

  • datum – Datum Heading [deg]

  • rel_angle – Path Heading Relative to starting heading [deg]

  • follow – Boolean to specify whether to Line Follow

  • compass – Boolean to specify whether to Compass Track

  • bump – Bump mode (Off, Error, or Next State)

MECHA03 ROMI
